help-file.title: "BLOOD REAVER"
help-file.content:
The Blood Reaver has mastered the use of pain and blood bonds using this to create a number of new abilities. With its attention fully focused on a victim the reaver will slowly but steadily drain the victim of his life by presence alone. He may also link with a fellow group member to drain or give life depending on how is hurt. It is a two-way bond.
Innate Abilities -------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Drain Life
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 10th circle: Blood Alliance
